column2: "Man, those Tundra Natives are total cowards! They get to blend in with the snow, while I'm out there sticking out like a sore thumb!"
"And just when you think you're safe, they all jump out and pounce on you at once! Things go from 0 to peril in no time flat!"

"And it's so cold there...
How am I supposed to fight properly in a place like that, I ask ya?!"
"I'm counting on you here, killer. I'll be watching every move you make!"
